content: same st *treble_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet remove st marker 2tr ch2 2tr into st marked* x 4 omitting final 2tr ch2 2tr slip_stitch to beginning sttr don t fasten_off 24tr 16dc 12hdc 4 chsp 2 round 6 - colour white slip_stitch into 2nd treble_crochet of round 5 slip_stitch into chsp ch4 counts as a treble_crochet 1tr ch2 2tr into same chsp *treble_crochet 11dc treble_crochet 2tr ch2 2tr in chsp* x 4 omitting final 2tr ch2 2tr join with an invisible join and fasten_off 24tr 44dc 4 chsp your evil eye granny square is finished i d love to see your version of the evil eye granny square so please tag me @crochetdahlia #evileyegrannysquare if you have any issues with the pattern please do not hesitate to contact me via email crochetdahliaofficial@gmail com or social media this pattern cannot be altered distributed or sold but items made from this pattern may be sold provided @crochetdahlia is acknowledged as the designer karen x 3
